title: Integrated Mental Practice and Modeling Course for Medical Cognitive Content Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Language education for mid-level professional learners in administrative/leadership roles

learning_goals: Learners can apply core elements in simulation-based crisis scenarios with 80% accuracy based on medical cognitive content.
Learners can recall complex medical procedures with over 75% accuracy by combining mental practice and modeling.
Learners can perform management procedures without errors against criteria in mock scenario assessments within one week post-education.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
